markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Geniekin](/Traits.aspx?ID=340)</title>

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 141 <sup>3.0</sup>

An umbrella term for planar scions descended from beings from the Elemental Planes. Geniekin craft and use these weapons.
name: Geniekin
